snippet.title: [TRAILER] The Slimeking's Tower 1.4
snippet.description:
Android Free Download: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.revampedpro.theslimekingtower
iOS Free Download: https://itunes.apple.com/es/app/the-slimekings-tower/id1173631750

The Slimeking's Tower 1.4 update is coming this 18th of May 2017 introducing new content and features:

· More than 100 new items.
· Over 40 new bosses and enemies.
· Cutscenes.
· New zone and new endings.
· 20 deadly challenges to beat.
· Unlockable characters with unique abilities and equipment.
· Pickups, chests, new rooms, new layouts and much more.
· Pet system with buffs that help the player.

ABOUT THE SLIMEKING'S TOWER
The Slimeking's Tower is an action-roguelike game where you'll have to reach the upper floor of a tower where the grumpy king of the slimes is waiting for you to kick his sticky face and retrieve your people's moustaches back!

Features
· Explore a procedural generated tower that changes every time you play.
· Collect over 300 items as you explore the tower that will change the way you play.
· Unlock different characters with unique abilities and equipment.
· Five different gamemodes to master.
· Prove yourself by beating 20 deadly challenges.
· Slay over 100 different enemies and bosses.
